name: Trainz Trouble
description: Just one wrong move could spell disaster! Can you keep the wheels in motion as trains speed to their various destinations?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 440 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is okay, nothing fancy. It isn't outstanding but it has nearly everything I wanted. It didn't allow the camera angle to change or even to zoom in or out. I would of liked some more ambient sounds. Other than that the difficulty increases nicely and mechanics play as expected. 6.0/10
